title: Provider Registration with Email Verification
description: Test provider registration flow ensuring email verification token is sent and verified before account activation.

steps.description: Navigate to provider registration page.
Fill registration form with valid email and password.
Submit registration form.
Verify registration success message and email verification token is sent.
Attempt login before verifying email.
Verify login is denied due to unverified email.
Verify email by using valid verification token link.
Verify email is marked as verified and login succeeds.

title: Provider Login with JWT Authentication
description: Ensure provider can log in with correct credentials and receives valid JWT token; reject login with incorrect credentials or unverified email.

steps.description: Navigate to provider login page.
Input verified provider email and correct password.
Submit login form.
Check login success and valid JWT token issuance.
Input verified provider email and incorrect password.
Submit login form.
Check login failure message.
Input unverified provider email and correct password.
Submit login form.
Verify login denied due to unverified email.

title: Provider Dashboard Access Authorization
description: Verify that only authenticated providers with verified email and valid JWT tokens access provider dashboard and related APIs.

steps.description: Attempt to access provider dashboard API without JWT token.
Confirm access is denied with appropriate error.
Attempt to access provider dashboard API with invalid or expired JWT token.
Confirm access is denied.
Attempt to access with JWT token of provider with unverified email.
Confirm access denied.
Access provider dashboard API with valid verified JWT token.
Confirm access granted and dashboard data returned.

title: Provider Work Schedule Configuration
description: Validate that providers can create, update, and delete weekly work schedule and unavailable days, and the changes reflect in available appointment slots.

steps.description: Login as verified provider.
Navigate to work schedule configuration.
Set working hours for a day of the week.
Mark specific dates as unavailable days.
Save changes.
Verify work schedule and unavailable days are saved correctly.
Retrieve available appointment slots for affected dates.
Confirm available slots respect work schedule and exclude unavailable days.
Modify or delete working hours for a day.
Verify updated available slots reflect changes accurately.

title: Patient Booking Appointment Flow with Validations
description: Verify patient can book appointment selecting visit type, date, time, and optionally health insurance, with validations and availability filtering applied.

steps.description: Navigate to provider's public profile page.
Click 'Agendar visita' to start booking flow.
Select visit type and consult/practice type.
Verify health insurance options are filtered correctly based on visit type.
Select available date and time slot.
Fill patient information form.
Submit booking form.
Confirm appointment is created successfully, respecting provider work schedule, booked slots, and unavailable days.
Confirm prevention of duplicate bookings for same client/provider/date/time.

title: Booking Attempt with Unavailable Dates and Holiday Constraints
description: Verify booking does not allow selection of dates on provider unavailable days or hardcoded holidays, and rejects attempts appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to booking flow for a provider.
Attempt to select a date marked as unavailable by provider.
Confirm such date is not selectable or booking fails with message.
Attempt to select a date that is a predefined holiday.
Confirm date not selectable or booking blocked with an appropriate error.

title: Appointment Confirmation Page and Secure Token Cancellation
description: Verify patient can view appointment confirmation and cancel appointment securely using token within allowed timeframe (>24 hours before appointment).

steps.description: Complete appointment booking to get confirmation page with cancellation token link.
Visit appointment confirmation page using valid appointment ID and token.
Verify appointment details display correctly.
Attempt cancellation with valid token more than 24 hours before appointment.
Confirm appointment is cancelled successfully.
Attempt cancellation with valid token less than 24 hours before appointment.
Confirm cancellation is rejected due to time constraint.
Attempt cancellation with invalid or expired token.
Confirm cancellation is denied.

title: Provider Appointment Management and Cancellation
description: Test provider access to upcoming appointments with filtering options and ability to cancel appointments triggering optional WhatsApp notifications.

steps.description: Login as a verified provider.
Access appointments tab on provider dashboard.
Filter appointments by date, status, or patient.
Verify filtering returns correct results.
Cancel an upcoming appointment using provider controls.
Confirm appointment status updated to cancelled.
If WhatsApp messaging configured, verify notification is sent.

title: Health Insurance Option Filtering During Booking
description: Ensure health insurance options presented to patient during booking are filtered correctly based on selected visit type and provider offerings.

steps.description: Open booking flow for a given provider.
Select different visit types one by one.
Verify only compatible health insurance options are displayed relevant to the selected visit type.
Attempt to select invalid or unsupported health insurance option.
Ensure option cannot be selected or booking is rejected.

title: Rate Limiting on Critical Endpoints
description: Test that rate limits are properly enforced on registration, login, and appointment creation endpoints to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Send multiple registration requests rapidly from the same IP.
Confirm rate limiting error response is returned after threshold.
Send rapid successive login attempts with valid and invalid credentials.
Verify API enforces rate limit and blocks requests accordingly.
Submit multiple appointment creation requests rapidly for the same provider.
Ensure rate limit is triggered and requests are throttled.

title: Landing Page Accessibility and Localization
description: Verify the landing page content is accessible, responsive, correctly localized to Argentinian Spanish, and displays CTA buttons properly.

steps.description: Open landing page on desktop and mobile devices.
Verify page layout is responsive and content is well-formatted.
Verify UI text is localized in Argentinian Spanish.
Verify all Call-To-Action buttons (register, login) are visible and clickable.
Use keyboard navigation and test with screen reader.
Verify accessibility compliance is met (labels, focus management).

title: API Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify the health check endpoint returns correct status and response format.

steps.description: Send GET request to API health check endpoint.
Verify response status code is 200 and response body indicates healthy system.

title: Admin Master Password Reset Endpoint
description: Test super admin endpoint to reset provider password and ensure authorization, success, and failure cases.

steps.description: Attempt to reset provider's password without admin authorization.
Confirm request is denied due to insufficient privileges.
Login as super admin and submit password reset request for a provider.
Confirm password reset is successful and provider can login with new password.
Submit password reset with invalid provider ID.
Confirm error response for invalid target provider.
